person.handwriting: In Bagnall & Cribiore, p. 261: Gonis (2003) has suggested that Apollonous here is the same as the sender of P.Mich. 8.464
person.name: Apollonous

person.handwriting: THE ENTIRE LETTER is written in the same hand, although the first two lines are written with a thicker pen point and too much ink. The hand is not a beginner's, but it is uneven and a bit too detached to be called fluent. There are several corrections. (Bagnall & Cribiore)
